text: eheyin pratikṣēpa kaḷavun num̆balā (yuda bimē) hamu vū viṭa (ovungē) gelaval vetaṭa pahara denu. avasānayē num̆balā ovun abhibhavanaya kara gat viṭa yuddhaya tama āyudha bima tabana tek (ovun) grahaṇaya kirīma num̆balā tadinma sidu karanu. eya pasu anugraha dækvīmak hō vandi labā gænīmak viya hæka. meya (allāhgē niyōgaya) vē. allāh abhimata karannē nam ovungen ohuma vipākaphalaya ganu æta. namut (ohu esē sidu nokaḷē) num̆balāgen ætæmek ætæmeku visin ohu parīkṣāvaṭa pat karanu piṇisaya. tavada allāhgē mārgayē ghātanaya karanu læbūvan vanāhi ovungē kriyāvan ahimi vī yannaṭa ohu iḍa harinnē næta
